attributes.action: Ask Cheshire W and Chester Council to BLOCK plans to demolish Hartford College
attributes.additional_details:
Please see the link below for full story! Our council have stated they disagree so now they need to take action! 

https://www.northwichguardian.co.uk/news/17237642.warrington-and-vale-royal-college-unveils-hartford-homes-bid/
attributes.background: Cheshire College Hartford campus is being sold to housing developers! It will be flattened and 108 houses will be built! Our children need more facilities! There will be more congestion meaning more danger for our kids! They have to stay in education until 18 and with not enough room locally how??

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local planning issues are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
